settings.title: Nuevo
settings.text: Furniture and lighting that demands creative spaces. Designing with only the finest stone, steel and wood, Nuevo seeks new materials and finishing techniques to inspire the design process. Constantly challenging themselves on how to fit their brand into any creative space.
Seriously Sumptuous Furniture, Fixtures & Accessories for Industry & Trade

settings.name: DANIEL
settings.text: Totally fell in love with the collection working alongside Oben Shops on some creative projects. Every piece I stumbled upon made me say "oh I want that too". Definitely creating a collection of their art + prints for my office.

settings.name: DMB
settings.text: Exciting quality pieces that are backed by reliable, attentive and knowledgeable service. It's so important when making this type of investment that you can feel comfortable and be 100% satisfied. Fun company to deal with!

settings.name: CHRISTINA
settings.text: Browsing through the beautifully curated collection at Oben is inspiring and a joy! Ordering through Oben was seamless and delivery was punctual. Professional, start to finish, and I just love my new light fixture!

settings.subtitle: exquisite
settings.title:
Handpicked
pieces
settings.text:
Oben Shops is your go-to for the highest quality, 
internationally imported designer furniture and contract products. Whether your sourcing for a clients project or for your own uniquely eclectic home, you’ll love 
our curated collection of posh pieces.

Shop from our collection of furniture, wall systems, doors, kitchens, vanities and floor coverings. And if you don't see what you're looking for, we'll source it for you.

settings.subtitle: about
settings.title: Oben Shops
settings.text: From the home of Oben Group, Oben Shops houses one of Canada’s most uniquely curated European furniture, artwork and décor collections. Known for their eclectic and bold selection of furniture and accessories, browse their show-stopping pieces from Morelato, Gio Pagani, Barovier & Toso, Vistosi and more.

settings.subtitle: a word from
settings.title: Our Founder
settings.text:
Oben Shops was born out of the idea that beautiful spaces and good design should be accessible to everyone. 

At first, Oben Shops curated collections and provided services exclusively to the internal projects and clients of Oben Group Inc.  But we’ve now grown to be able to offer these same services and products to third party industry specialists such as Interior Designers, Architects and Builders alike.  

Sectors we service include: Hospitality, Contract, Commercial, Healthcare, Residential, Public, Restaurants (F&B), Events, Educational, Retail, Condo and Multi-Unit Dwellings etc. 

We are excited to announce that we have most recently collaborated with Black Bread + Jam, an Italian Design Consultancy Firm, with whom we’ve worked extensively with over the years through Oben Group of Companies. Much of the allure and sophistication of the Oben Flats lobbies were established by sourcing and working with BB+J. So, we are incredibly excited to now offer you access to exclusive brands, latest trends and quality products, direct from Italy, together. 

Through our partnership, we have launched our Pop-Up Apartment at the Distillery District in Toronto, Ontario. Our showroom will have permanent and rotating displays of our most coveted luxury brands and products, many of which we harbour exclusivity. 

Come join us as we celebrate our Italian Partners and host monthly events where we will present you with keynote speakers, discuss market trends and simply network. 

We hope to see you at our showroom soon. Or, if you would like to book an appointment. Please click on link below.
